fields.description: Privacy Notice: For term submission purposes we request business contact information only, not personal information. Any contact information that you enter will be stored on a publicly accessible web site in support of CDISC term submission tracking. NCI-EVS or CDISC personnel may contact you

parts.text: Fill in the following fields as appropriate. For multiple term submissions (any more than 3 terms), please click on and download the
Excel file CDISC Controlled Terminology Multiple Term Request Spreadsheet.
Fill in the template appropriately, add your name and request date to the end of the file name, and Email the completed file to
In addition, please submit this CDISC New Term Request form indicating "File emailed separately" in the “Additional Information” field below.

fields.name: Term or Codelist Request
fields.placeholder: Enter the Term or Codelist Request Information

fields.name:
If submitting a new term include a description of the term, the data context within which it is being used, and any supplemental information that further clarifies the request.
 If submitting a change to existing term, include justification for why the change is necessary, along with relevant references.
 If a multiple term request spreadsheet or other supplemental information is being submitted, enter "File emailed separately\”. Failure to include supporting information may delay resolution of the request.
